title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 385: Featuring Nick Foligno
description:
On Episode 385 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Nick Foligno. Nick joined to discuss his relationship with his brother Marcus, his time with the Blue Jackets, playing for Torts, and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing all things NHL Playoffs. The boys break down each series and talk about all the upcoming games this week. Is Dallas going to upset Calgary? Will Leafs-Lightning go 7 games? Has the tide shifted in the Boston-Carolina series? How good is Colorado? We discuss it all.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
